IntroductionYour Role and ResponsibilitiesWe are currently seeking an experienced Cloud Solution Architect for Managed Services to support our clients.Some of the responsibilities for the Cloud Solution Architect:Leads or performs the installation and/or management of the physical or operational elements of the system, including network management, operating system, application platforms, and database components.
Provides in-depth knowledge of the IBM Cloud, Azure or AWS Ecosystem and evaluates the customer’s business and technical requirements as a trusted advisor.
Develops Cloud architectural designs that includes – IaaS, Networking, App Services, Databases, and Authentication/Access Management etc.
Provides documentation of the technical design which express what actions a solution must take and what outcome is expected
Conducts technical proof of concepts for first of a kind, unknown, or complex situations.
Conduct customer workshop, capability demonstration, proof of concept of offering etc.
Participates in business development activities, from opportunity identification, qualification, scoping, solutioning, proposal writing, orals presentations and demonstrations.
Understands the relationship the delivery of cloud services plays in client success and takes pride in being a trusted advisor.
Project Management and leadership skills and ability to lead technical cloud delivery projects from beginning to end.Required Technical and Professional Expertise4+ years’ experience with Cloud Security, Data privacy and Threat protection
Experience delivering cloud projects (IBM, AWS, and/or Azure) and the DevSecOps pipeline
Experience with NIST, PCI DSS, HIPAA, and ISO27K cloud security compliance standards
4+ years’ experience in an architectural leadership role, with proven ability of defining and documenting security policies and proceduresPreferred Technical and Professional ExpertiseNoneJob Details
